title: Glottography dataset derived from Hochstetler et al. 2004 "Sociolinguistic survey of the Dogon language area"
description: The dataset provides contemporary ranges for Dogon languages as reported in Hochstetler et al. 2004.
citation: Hochstetler, J Lee & Evelin IK Durieux Jude A and Durieux-Boon. 2004. Sociolinguistic survey of the Dogon language area. SIL International. Citeseer.
